page.title: 03HEALTH in RHAYADER
page.content: The local{doctors}1 male and 1 female, work from their new modern surgery where they also have a practice nurse. 3 community nurses also work from this base. The{health visitor}works from the health clinic visiting the school, the eldery and young babies at home. Speech Therapy, Chiropody, Ante-Natal and Child Welfare{clinics {are held weekly}with a county Dietician visiting monthly. A{dentist also visits once a week. There are no {hospitals}in the area, the nearest cottage hospitals being at Llandrindod Wells and Llanidloes both 13miles away. The district general hospitals are at Aberystwyth 35miles and Hereford 45miles away. The{ambulance {service}is provided by St.John's Ambulance Brigade.
